app_description: Discover the best homemade food prepared just for you.
forgot_password_desc_initial: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password_desc_sent: If an account exists for this email, a reset link has been sent.
password_reset_link_sent: We've sent a password reset link to your email address.
demo_link_in_console: For demo purposes, the reset link is logged in the console.
reset_link_sent_desc: If your email is in our system, you will receive a password reset link.
unauthorized_email_desc: This email provider is not allowed. Please use a whitelisted provider.
customer_login_desc: Access your account to order delicious homemade meals.
chef_login_desc: Access your dashboard to manage orders and your menu.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
reset_password_desc: Enter and confirm your new password for {{email}}.
password_reset_link_invalid: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.
password_changed_successfully_desc: You can now log in with your new password.
customer_signup_desc: Join our community to discover and order homemade food.
chef_signup_desc: Join our platform to showcase your culinary skills.
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
validation_email_contains_invalid_chars: Email contains invalid characters. Please remove any special symbols or spaces.
last_5_reviews: The last 5 reviews from your customers.
menu_management_desc: Add new dishes, edit prices, and update availability from the dedicated menu management page.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Start your journey by adding your first signature dish!
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef has not added any dishes yet.
no_reviews_for_dish: No reviews for this dish yet. Be the first to try it!
delivery_information_desc: The order will be delivered to the address registered in your account.
login_required_desc: You must log in or create a new account to complete your order.
chef_is_busy_desc: Your order will be placed in a queue and you will be notified upon confirmation.
order_error_desc: Please make sure you are logged in and have a delivery address set.
order_sent_toast: Your order has been sent successfully!
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: The chef is busy, your order has been waitlisted.
order_sent_toast_review_desc: Your order for {{quantity}}x {{dishName}} is under review.
discover_best_chefs: Discover the Best Chefs in Your Area
discover_best_chefs_desc: Browse a selection of talented chefs and explore their signature meals.
search_placeholder: Search for a chef or specialty...
no_chefs_available: No chefs available at the moment
wait_for_chefs: Wait for our creative chefs to join!
view_past_orders: View your past order history and rate them.
no_orders_yet_desc: It seems you haven't placed any orders yet. Browse the dishes and start ordering!
profile_desc: Update your personal information and profile picture.
bio_placeholder: A short bio about you and your cooking style...
profile_updated_desc: Your changes have been saved successfully.
update_error_desc: Failed to save changes. Please try again.
pending_orders_desc: You are now available. Please review the orders that were on the waitlist.
coupon_code_min_length: Code must be at least 3 characters.
coupon_code_alphanumeric: Code must contain only English letters and numbers.
usage_limit_min: Usage limit must be at least 1.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after start date.
select_one_dish_for_specific: Please select at least one dish for a specific discount.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
specific_dishes_desc: Select the dishes this coupon applies to.
no_dishes_to_add: You have no dishes to add.
coupon_management_desc: Create promotional coupons to attract more customers to your dishes.
no_coupons_desc: Start by creating your first coupon to offer discounts to your customers!
price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
dish_image_required: A valid dish image URL is required.
prep_time_positive: Preparation time must be a positive integer.
dish_description_placeholder: A short description of the dish
dish_ingredients_separator: Separate each ingredient with a comma (,).
delete_dish_warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the dish "{{name}}".
rate_order_placeholder: Tell us about your experience with the meal...
review_submitted_toast_desc: Your review has been submitted successfully.
change_password_desc: Update your password. Use a strong password that you haven't used before.
password_changed_toast_desc: Your password has been updated successfully.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: An error occurred, please try again.
auth_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a symbol.
auth_email_not_allowed: This email provider is not allowed. Please use an official email provider like Gmail or Outlook.
auth_incorrect_credentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
auth_email_in_use: This email is already in use.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
auth_passwords_do_not_match: The new passwords do not match.
auth_old_password_incorrect: The old password you entered is incorrect.
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: The chef is currently busy. Your order for '{{dishName}}' has been placed in the queue.
new_waitlisted_order_notification_desc: You have a new waitlisted order from {{customerName}}. It will appear when you set your status to 'Available'.
new_order_notification_desc: You have a new order for '{{dishName}}' from {{customerName}}.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: Your order for '{{dishName}}' is now being prepared!
order_on_the_way_notification_title: Your Order is on the Way!
order_on_the_way_notification_desc: Your delicious meal '{{dishName}}' is on its way to you.
order_delivered_notification_desc: Enjoy your meal '{{dishName}}'. Don't forget to rate the experience.
order_rejected_notification_desc: Unfortunately, your order for '{{dishName}}' has been rejected.
coupon_expired_error: This coupon is expired or not yet active.
coupon_limit_reached_error: The maximum usage limit for this coupon has been reached.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon does not apply to this dish.
